org.catechis.lists
Class WeeklyReports

java.lang.Object
  org.catechis.lists.WeeklyReports

public class WeeklyReports
extends java.lang.Object

Work with year-month-week.xml weekly session history reports in the root_path/user_id/subject/history folder. * This is the number of all stat hitories saved during the week. * word_test_elapsed_time/number_of_session_tests 2156 2.6154916512059367 2.771799628942486 21 137 155 1843 44 227 243 1642

Author:
timmy
